catalog_info.title: Bioethics, Law, and the Life Sciences
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with the Kennedy School as IGA-515.
catalog_info.prereq: Anti-Req: Cannot be taken for credit by students who have already taken IGA-515
catalog_info.description: Seeks to identify and explore salient ethical, legal, and policy issues $ and possible solutions $ associated with developments in biotechnology and the life sciences.
